'''"Contented Elegance"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Contented Elegance" is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Fontaine]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest after solving a [[Water Volume Detection Crystal]] puzzle south of the [[New Fontaine Research Institute]].
